title: 240A.01 DEFINITIONS.
text:
As used in sections 240A.01 to 240A.07, the words defined in this section have the meanings given them.
"Commission" means the Minnesota Amateur Sports Commission.
"Local governments" means counties, towns, statutory or home rule charter cities, school districts, or any combination of them.
"Sports facility" or "sports facilities" means real or personal property or both suitable for holding those amateur sports competitions determined by the commission.
